AIsystem.来源: A car dealership added an AI chatbot to its site. Then all hell broke loose.

Risk.来源: People buy brand-new Chevrolets for $1 from a ChatGPT chatbot

Consequence.来源: It's easy to trick Chevrolet's stupid AI chatbot into selling you a car for a dollar—but don't expect the company to honor the deal
